name: Stuck In The Center Prototype
description:
Planning to come back and add boss and fix bugs

Made for 

SM TAFE - Alpha @S!F End of Semester Game Jam 4

Planning to add
-Boss
-Background
-Pause / Settings
-bug fixes (ik about most of em but send me them anyways)

Stuck in the center is a 2.5D plat former where u can find items to help defend yourself or attack the infected.

Controls
D = Right

A = Left

W = Jump

W in Air = Double Jump (Need boots)

Space = Shoot(Need Gun)
